ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt

Interface KeyPairGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DHKeyPairGenerator, DSAKeyPairGenerator, JCADHKeyPairGenerator, JCADSAKeyPairGenerator, RIMDHKeyPairGenerator, RIMDSAKeyPairGenerator

    public interface KeyPairGenerator
    Class that generates pairs of public and private keys for various asymmetric algorithms.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyPair generateKeyPair()
      Generates a key pair.
      java.lang.String getAlgorithm()
      Returns the algorithm for the keys being generated.
